prompt: A professional headshot of a female SaaS founder, captured with studio lighting against a neutral background. The image should convey confidence and professionalism, with the woman looking directly at the camera and wearing business attire. Variations can include different hairstyles, facial expressions, and subtle changes in attire to maintain uniqueness while keeping a consistent professional vibe.

A professional headshot of a male SaaS advisor, captured with studio lighting against a neutral background. The image should convey expertise and trustworthiness, with the man looking directly at the camera and wearing business attire. Variations can include different hairstyles, facial expressions, and subtle changes in attire to ensure each image is unique, while maintaining a consistent professional appearance.
